attributes.action: Call a public inquiry into Russian influence on UK politics & democracy
attributes.additional_details: We believe recent events underscore the urgency of this issue.
attributes.background: We are concerned about reported efforts from Russia to influence democracy in the US, UK, Europe and elsewhere. We believe we must establish the depth and breadth of possible Russian influence campaigns in the UK.
